note:
Trying the new display name. You're going to have to decide for yourself if you pronounce Steel as "Stee-el" or Raziel as "Razeel." My brain keeps trying to settle on one, but I won't let it.

A rusty truck with only twenty miles
a long way from home
a smile like a scar
Sign right here

Once an erotica writer. Maybe someday again.
The world needs about 20% more compassion averaged over the population, though even 5% might save us all. Let's start with that.
